availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel P. Hunt (Mason County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Bermuda. Married to Mary Agness Mullins Hunt in Mason County on December 11, 1852. Father of Mary E. Hunt, Natalia Hunt, Emma Hunt, Sallie Hunt, and John Hunt. Merchant in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, p. 14.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, Maysville, Ward 4, p. 437B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Kenton County Marriages, 1863-1887, Film #000281844, p. 479, p. 182 of 444 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
"Daniel Hunt: A Venerable Maysville Citizen Suddenly Stricken," The Evening Bulletin (Maysville, Kentucky), July 29, 1901, p. 3.
